alert.note: Alert for Covington; Forrest; Jefferson Davis; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Forrest, southeastern Covington, southwestern Jones and southeastern Jefferson Davis Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sanford, or 7 miles southeast of Collins, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sanford around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Seminary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
